title: MF vu
body:
So ive read that MF is on the work for an update. I hope she get the tristana/katarina/sejuani/sivir treatment

that being said I wanna share my take on mf and how I picture her.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/IOKIboyl.jpg[/img]

Reading her lore...mf is a legenday bounty hunter, captain and a person that influences the political stance of Bilgewater.
She knows she is really good looking so she uses her looks....to get some things done.

What do you guys think? I will be posting her skins and stuff.

**Candy Cane MF**

[img]http://i.imgur.com/6WWOWa0.jpg[/img]

Candy Cane it could be such a great skin...her bullets are snowballs, her dance it could be jingle bell rock from mean girls.

**Road Warrior MF**

[img]http://i.imgur.com/i2pPmw1.jpg[/img]

Road Warrior MF....mmm its a really weird choice for a skin on mf...I could see it work on graves... But well, mad max is coming...my inspiration for this was Luis Royo millenium girls.

**Waterloo MF**

[img]http://i.imgur.com/wd6DDJ8.jpg[/img]

Waterloo MF....with this skin I tried to make it more french military from the XVIII century...where she look more like a General. 

**Cowgirl MF**

[img]http://i.imgur.com/BstMQ5k.jpg[/img]

Cowgirl MF....was the first skin I bought for MF...I think its her best skin -this was long time ago before arcade came up- she is blond, she is sexy....this skin doesnt need much change actually...I just fringe-up lol

**Mafia MF**

So....with mafia I found myself on a crossroad...I really like the concept of MF being all 1920 new york ganster, she is literally wearing the hat, the suit, and all....but mafia jinx came in and they make her a flapper girl...because it fit her thematically and it was something you would have seen on that era.

So I though about it....for MF thematically what could fit her...in the mafia culture in the 1920....so here is my take.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/mJBxg8i.jpg[/img]

The inspiration is quite clear (Jessica Rabbit)....if jinx is a flapper girl, MF should be a siren from the noir films.

**Secret Agent MF**

[img]http://i.imgur.com/V2Lt59p.jpg[/img]

Same case with mafia...when you think "MF is a secret agent" the first picture that comes to your mind...its not a MF in a dress....you picture black widow.....so yeah.

replies.body:
I definitely like that idea on Secret Agent MF a lot better then the one we have. Always thought it didn't really fit the "secret agent" theme they way they made it.  The waterloo being made into more of a general also is a much better idea for that skin.

Mafia MF on the other hand, being my favorite skin of hers, I still like it the way it is but that's a nice idea for it as well.

I know MF is suppose to be THE sexual icon in league based on her background and stuff since she tends to use seduction to get her way, but please give her the Akali treatment and nerf her boobs.  Lol. They're obnoxious.
but but :c its MF :c
{{champion:21}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:21}} That's sexy
{{champion:21}} thank you

wow this is really good! did you seriously draw this? this is actually really good! did i already say how good this is? I MEAN JESUS! seriously, this is superb, can't wait to see your other skins!

edit: can you tell me what type of pens you used to ink your art? I'm actually trying to step up my game with my art work and instead of sketching, however, I don't know which pens to get :(
Oh thaaaanks!!!...means a lot ...Mf is my favorite champion :3...and yes Ive been drawing this XD
I'm a big Sion fan and I in fact did this piece a month back, and Gosh! I would also would really appreciate if you gave me a review on this as well if you have the time! Thanks!
Jesus, that's **good**. Like, Good God. Post this on deviantart or tumblr, I can't stand not having it elsewhere!

can you give me a review on my art? I really want another experienced artist to tell me if I am doing anything wrong or if I am Doing anything right. It would mean a lot to me! This was my first champion design, It actually was one of my favorite drawings that I did a few month back.
Heeey those are really nice drawings :3...I really like the face on daerkras! good job. And sion looks really cool, the only thing is that you need is to ink it *3*
Yeah I use artist pen from fabercastell.
well done. i agree with mafia mf as a "molly girl". besides, they need to make mf sexier. her classic skin is too clunky.
I agree with your mafia take, she should definitely go for the siren look over a genderbent mafia uniform. Especially since jinx's mafia skin came out.

Wow, every single one of these pics are incredible. As a huge MF player myself (my favorite champion of all time), I can't wait til riot gives her a much needed VU. They should definitely take a look at these for inspiration! Keep up the good work they're amazing!
thaaanks....since youre a big MF player, witch one is your favorite? if I may ask

> [{quoted}](name=Leu07,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=0Ux8fEg3,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-02-22T17:56:45.450+0000)
>
> thaaanks....since youre a big MF player, witch one is your favorite? if I may ask

Definitely the cowgirl drawing. I think it's sexy as hell.
Bumpity-Bump! these are fantastic!
thaank you
*Secret Agent is AMAZING*
thaaaaanks
these pictures are great riot should def take a look at them.
thank you :3
Those all look incredible. Already better than her current splash arts. Well, except maybe the base splash and the arcade, but those are high marks.
oh thank you very much...its doesnt supposed those drawing where current splash art....they are just concept art....but thanks a lot :3 thats a really big compliment.
